item.title: Carrauntoohil, Ireland
item.description: This is a picture of “Carrauntoohil” the highest mountain in Ireland (1039m), taken bellow “Caher West Top” side. Hike name : The Coomloughra Horseshoe Trail to Carrantuohill.

item.title: Draft
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Refuge Wallon Marcadau, Pyrénées, France
item.description: Picture taken from the camping zone bellow the “Refuge Wallon Marcadau” around 6pm when the sun was setting on the valley. In the center we have “Pic Ruben Pantet” (2867m) on the left and “Pic Arraillous” (2704m) on the right. Taken my 6-day hike of the “Tour du grand Vignemale” in 2024. Zooming in the top half part of the picture focusing more on both Pic great a better picture.
